channel.title: Need help with monsters
channel.description:
I need help with monster.
I Do Red_Dragon it pulls up red dragon level 152 then i change Hp to like 15000 and when i go to kill it, all it has is 159 HP. Thank you if you can help me i appreciate it. :)

item.title: Need help with monsters
item.dc:creator: @Hemnoith Hemnoith
item.description:
@Hemnoith wrote:

accually it has 250 hp.... and it is because the hp bar can only hold up to 250.....(its an estimated number)

Even so that doesn’t explain the glicth. It DOES only hold so much health on the bar, however, after you use up that bar another is filled. I figured this out when I was on a server and a monster wasn’t dying although his bar was depleted. It kept comming back. After a while I finally beat it and realised it was because it had 10,000 HP. So the glicth is weird. Sorry I can’t help =/

Read full topic
